pages.text:
Our Story
Hey there!  My name is Aaron Levine and I am the founder of Homespun Kitchen. I’ve been dreaming of creating healthy fast food restaurants since I was in high school.  With the amazing encouragement, support and help from my wife Angela and an incredible team, what was once a dream has been a reality since 2009!
For me, the dream of creating Homespun started in the mid 1990’s. Growing up, I saw how hard it was for my parents, who both worked, to cook and eat healthy. There were plenty of convenient options but none of them were healthy. As a matter of a fact, most of the options were awful for us! Fast food was a staple in our house growing up. Witnessing this struggle and wanting to help solve the problem was the initial inspiration for Homespun!
After graduating high school, I went to college and studied engineering however I worked at restaurants, collected menus from around the world and continually worked on plans for my healthy restaurant. In mid 2009, with tremendous encouragement from Angela, the timing was right and the official journey began!
Today, Homespun is the best version of my visions from the 1990s! Homespun is a place where you can get delicious, responsible, scratch-made-food, fast.  I wrote more about our journey in a
blog post
a while back.
Today, our goals have expanded far beyond just serving healthy food fast. As our understanding of the restaurant industry has evolved, we have learned that there are many more challenges to solve beyond just serving healthy food fast. We have become obsessed with sustainability, sourcing, creating an amazing place to work, creating careers, helping our community and mentoring aspiring business owners.  Thanks for reading, Aaron.
Our Commitments & Values
Persistence
To relentlessly search for the best ingredients available.
Transparency
We will never intentionally misrepresent ingredients or make false claims about what we use.  if you have any questions about our ingredients, please ask, we are proud to share what we use.
Value
We are always working to make eating healthy affordable.  We know we are not the cheapest option however our goal is to provide tremendous value.
Standards
Our goal is to use as many locally sourced, USDA Organic ingredients as possible.  When we can not find them we use the next best alternatives, always taking a local option when possible.  Here is our ranking:
USDA Organic
All Natural Non-GMO
All Natural.
Homespun Kitchen All Natural = Nothing artificial, minimally processed.
Need a Lift? Homespun Kitchen is a fun place to find healthy food!
Whether you’re hanging out at our bar enjoying a fro-yo, or you’re grabbing a delicious wrap or salad to fuel your day, we’re glad you’re here. Our foods are prepared with integrity and creativity for people who want to make better choices about what they put in their bodies.
%
of our Ingredients are Organic
%
of our Ingredients are Natural

Now hiring for Atlantic Beach and Riverside!
Join us on our mission to continue proving that healthy food can be delicious and served fast. Join a team where your voice is heard and you have the opportunity to be part of creating something great. Join a team that is proving every day that working in the restaurant industry can be rewarding and fun.
We are currently hiring:
Crew Members
|
Kitchen Crew
|
Shift Leaders
|
Assistant Managers
APPLY NOW
Learn More About Our Positions
Crew Member
JOB DESCRIPTION:
At Homespun Kitchen we serve delicious, healthy food, fast, with amazing hospitality. As a Crew Member, you are a critical face of our restaurant, interacting with customers, making food, keeping the restaurant clean and having fun while doing it. You do not need prior restaurant experience for this position but you do need a great attitude and a desire to learn!
TOTAL COMPENSATION:
$15.50 to $22 an hour
Starting
BASE PAY
for Crew Members ranges from
$13
to
$16
an hour based on experience. All Crew Members participate in Homespun Kitchen’s
TIP POOL
which is different at each store but ranges from
$2.50
to
$6
per hour for the last three years. Hourly rates for Crew Members including tips range between
$15.50
and
$22
an hour.
BENEFITS
Flexible Scheduling
, we believe in work life balance and want to be a positive force in your life, helping you achieve your goals
Paid Time Off
for full time employees
Team Bonuses
Health Coverage
for full time employees (coming soon)
Loving, Supportive, and Positive
work environment
Growth Opportunities
, we are in expansion mode, actively working on opening new stores. Our goal is to open new stores lead by current Homespun employees, through promotions
JOB DUTIES:
Running the cash register
Making food and beverages for customers
Prepping
Stocking
Expediting orders
Cleaning
Baking
Doing dishes
Putting smiles on customer’s faces
SUCCESSFUL CREW MEMBERS:
Are outgoing and friendly, take pride in hard work, are eager to learn new things, take guidance and constructive feedback well, enjoy putting smiles on people’s faces, work well under pressure, enjoy teamwork, and have good communication skills
EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:
No prior restaurant experience is required to join Homespun as a Crew Member.
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:
We work to actively promote employees from within. Successful Crew Members have rapid advancement opportunities!
APPLY NOW
Kitchen Crew
JOB DESCRIPTION:
At Homespun Kitchen we make just about everything from scratch. If you have a passion for cooking, baking and prepping, this is the place for you! We are looking for serious kitchen talent to join our team.
TOTAL COMPENSATION:
$15.50 to $24 an hour
Starting
BASE PAY
for Kitchen Positions range from
$13
to
$18
an hour based on experience. All Kitchen Positions participate in Homespun Kitchen’s
TIP POOL
which is different at each store but ranges from
$2.50
to
$6
per hour for the last three years. Hourly rates for the Kitchen Crew including tips ranges between
$15.50
and
$24
an hour.
BENEFITS
Flexible Scheduling
, we believe in work life balance and want to be a positive force in your life, helping you achieve your goals
Paid Time Off
for full time employees
Team Bonuses
Health Coverage
for full time employees (coming soon)
Loving, Supportive, and Positive
work environment
Growth Opportunities
, we are in expansion mode, actively working on opening new stores. Our goal is to open new stores lead by current Homespun employees, through promotions
JOB DUTIES:
Helping us make just about everything from scratch
Cooking proteins and veggies
Making sauces and dressings
Helping develop new recipes
Baking
Dishes
You name it, we make it
SUCCESSFUL KITCHEN CREW MEMBERS:
Love making food
Are fast
Follow recipes well
Know their way around a restaurant
Work well on a team
Enjoy hard work
Are eager to learn
EXPERIENCE NOT REQUIRED BUT PREFERRED:
The starting range for this position is heavily based on experience. We have successfully taught Crew Members with little to no kitchen experience to be very productive in the kitchen. At the same time, we are always looking for talented kitchen crew and welcome experienced people to apply. We are a high volume restaurant looking for talented people for this position who are excited to let their skills shine!
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:
We work to actively promote employees from within. Successful Kitchen Members have rapid advancement opportunities!
APPLY NOW
Shift Leader
JOB DESCRIPTION:
As a Shift Leader, you are a critical leader at our restaurant, directing work flow of Crew Members, leading by example and helping to build upon the amazing culture we are creating for our team. We do not yell, we build people up and believe in helping people be the best version of themselves.
TOTAL COMPENSATION:
$17.50 to $24 an hour

, we are in expansion mode, actively working on opening new stores. Our goal is to open new stores lead by current Homespun employees, through promotions

Directing the work flow of Crew Members

Providing constructive guidance to Crew Members

Making food and beverages for customers

Are outgoing and friendly

Enjoy putting smiles on people’s faces

Enjoy teamwork

EXPERIENCE REQUIRED:
Applicants must have at least two years of shift leader experience to apply for this position.
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:
At Homespun Kitchen we serve delicious, healthy food, fast, with amazing hospitality. Hospitality at Homespun does not just refer to how we treat customers. We believe true hospitality extends through all interactions with people at Homespun. This includes how we we work as a team and treat our fellow workers. We work to actively promote employees from within. Successful Shift Leaders have rapid advancement opportunities!
APPLY NOW
